token_info.name: untouched v.n. 001
token_info.description: “untouched v.n.” by Martina Menegon @mijnseoung is a series od 3D Scan-Selfies that started in 2015 under the title Virtual Narcissism (v.n.) and, since then, has transform into various different iterations. This current series is presented as Performative Virtual Sculpture with Augmented Reality capability (on mobile).
